Team Development Interviews Cc the following times on your calendars for your Team Development interview with the Richmar Group All interviews will be held in the Houston office Board Rm on the th floor The Richmar Group will be conducting the interviews They ask for everyone to please be flexible with your schedule Some individuals may need to minutes while others may need hours You will be called once or if the schedule begins to fluctuate Thursday July th Tuesday July th NAME TIME LOCATION NAME TIME LOCATION Cunningham Cutty Duffy Steve am am Board Rm Board Rm Cole Dan Ralph Susan am am Board Rm Board Rm Coombe Mary Ellen Border Robin am pm Board Rm Board Rm Lee Jim Hultsman David am pm Board Rm Board Rm LUNCH Gibbs Dana pm pm Board Rm LUNCH Sanford Robert pm pm Board Rm Maddox Lori Trevelise Jon pm pm Board Rm Board Rm Richards Joe Wright Gary pm pm Board Rm Board Rm The following will be phone interviews initiated by the Richmar Group Bob Jacobs California x Brent Brown Canada Steve Comstock Colorado ALSO Following for Everyone Please block off the following days on your calendar You will be notified once the time and place of the meetings in August have been determined Thursday August th Friday August th Saturday August th

Your decisionMr Lay I do not know you other than what I have been told by peers Everything has been with regard to a very high respect for you personally and what you have done with Enron I am an employee in the dollar range of EOTT and can not comprehend the salaries and monies made by top executives in shares given and privileges extended It is an honorable thing you are doing by not accepting the million but I personally feel you deserve something You have worked hard probably worried many hours and yes probably played hard and enjoyed much and with the empire you have built will continue to live the rest of your life in luxury a very enviable position to be in We are all where we are because of decisions we have made and your employees made their decision based on their best judgement call at the time Working for a company is like a marriage You put your faith trust and confidence in the person of your choice and that person can change and put you through a lot of turmoil and grief the same with the company you marry Employees will be able to recoop some of their savings once their stock has been converted to Dynegy I am not trying to change your mind about the money but want you to know that their are employees with feelings and a good mind to think things through and feel you are justified in accepting some reward for the dynasty you have helped to build Good luck to you in the future Continue to enjoy your life Respectfully
